title: Should the Police Kneel and March with the Protesters?
description:
Following @cvaldary, @BenjaminABoyce, @Bret Weinstein and @SophiaLeeHyun work on the question. I'll save you the time in that I won't give you a "yes" or "no" answer but I think this is a time to stop and think about what is going on and what it all means. Do we still have the language and vocabulary we need to progress? 

https://twitter.com/ConceptualJames/status/1267924062203973633
https://www.tabletmag.com/sections/news/articles/hub-city-riot-ninjas
https://twitter.com/cvaldary/status/1267928765772021762
https://twitter.com/PaulVanderKlay/status/1267930631188561921
https://twitter.com/BretWeinstein/status/1267880281672806401
https://twitter.com/SophiaLeeHyun/status/1267944267630047234
https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2018/12/why-third-wave-anti-racism-dead-end/578764/
https://twitter.com/mwestramke/status/1267104843052781569
https://religionnews.com/2020/06/01/at-george-floyd-protests-some-clergy-pray-others-put-their-bodies-and-souls-on-the-line/
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/06/02/opinion/george-floyd-protests-city.html
Pastoring in a Secular Age https://amzn.to/2Mp0ezo
Coddling of the American Mind https://amzn.to/3dzo1sw
Steve Jobs Stanford Commencement Address https://youtu.be/UF8uR6Z6KLc
Woman begging protestors to stop https://twitter.com/thejordynbrown/status/1266633436359344136
Benjamin Boyce https://youtu.be/-7SvMK1yEwc
Benjamin Boyce https://youtu.be/OrMD8gv91LA
Glen Loury and John McWhorter It Feels Good to be a Victim https://youtu.be/TJARKukC5Zo
Pepsi Protest Commercial https://youtu.be/uwvAgDCOdU4
Bearing the Cross David Garrow https://amzn.to/3ctn17V
Timothy Snyder Black Earth https://amzn.to/36WC5ts and Bloodlands https://amzn.to/2Xq8ENh
Hitler's Religion https://amzn.to/3eMN23g
